messages.subject: re: encouraging healthy food
messages.messageBody:
<<<hummus is a pureed middle eastern food made of chick peas (garbanzo
beans) olive
oil, garlic and maybe some lemon juice.
>>>

And a little bit of Tahini usually, which is a sesame seed paste and
gives it that unique flavor. Very yummy and most of the kids I know
really like it. We dip pita bread, chips, crackers, carrots, tapenade
(chopped up olives, garlic and such) and whatever else!

Heidi

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] re: encouraging healthy food
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh no no no! They re both! There s a sexual reason they re sensitive during sex! ;-) They efficiently serve a dual purpose. The male half of our society
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 9, 2007, at 12:39 AM, frozenandcold wrote:

> Only because societal messages tell us that boobs are sexual. Boobs
> are for feeding a child.

Oh no no no! They're both! There's a sexual reason they're sensitive
during sex! ;-) They efficiently serve a dual purpose.

The male half of our society may send out the message that women's
breasts are male territory, but *that's* an erroneous social message.

Joyce

messages.messageBody:
<<<<You would let a 3 year old try nursing after she had not been
nursing
for 2 years?

I'm sorry but that honestly seems disgusting to me and I feel it would
be very inapropriate. Because it wouldnt be for her sole nutrition, it

Only because societal messages tell us that boobs are sexual. Boobs
